verses.name: Exodus 13:1
verses.text: And the Lord spake unto Moses, saying,

verses.name: Exodus 13:2
verses.text: Sanctify unto me all the firstborn, whatsoever openeth the womb among the children of Israel, both of man and of beast: it is mine.

verses.name: Exodus 13:3
verses.text: And Moses said unto the people, Remember this day, in which ye came out from Egypt, out of the house of bondage; for by strength of hand the Lord brought you out from this place: there shall no leavened bread be eaten.

verses.name: Exodus 13:4
verses.text: This day came ye out in the month Abib.
